actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to restrict the recovery of Federal funds where such funds shall be applied to approved projects within the same State.

summary.text: Restricts the recovery of Federal funds expended for the construction of public health centers, nonprofit hospitals, outpatient facilities for long term care, or rehabilitation facilities pursuant to the Public Health Service Act where such funds shall be applied to approved projects within the same State.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to restrict the recovery of Federal funds where such funds shall be applied to approved projects within the same State.
